summary: Two Dark Fantasy ENB presets for the latest ENB binary. Really good performance and stunning visuals :)
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#e69138][size=3]
Dark Fantasy ENB preset for the latest ENB binary. Good performance and stunning visuals :)[/size][/color][/center]


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/eKE2MNS.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/xRSujTp.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qiF1BFd.jpg[/img][/center]


[center]Hi's Space15' videos:[/center]

[center][youtube]2OlEx7B4Ap0[/youtube][/center]

[center][youtube]zJG_bjf6cPE[/youtube][/center]


[center]I know, this video is too long and too boring. But if you want to see my mod in "action", watch it :)[/center]

[center][youtube]GiwdtPsod0I[/youtube][/center]


[center]... and NorthWind video:[/center]

[center][youtube]ymH7m41au8I[/youtube][/center]


[size=5][center][color=#ffd966][b]Updated Szarik and Gustlik ENB to 2.0 version - now fully compatible with 0.319 enb binaries.[/b][/color][/center][/size]


[center][youtube]Xmh7ux1JCc4[/youtube][/center]

[center]NorthWind video:[/center]

[center][youtube]gh3Gbk4Ev3w[/youtube][/center]

[color=#6aa84f][b][size=3]Installation:[/size][/b][/color]


STEP 1:
- Download latest [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0319.htm] ENB [/url], ( a black arrow at the bottom of the page ).
- Unzip it. Inside you will find two folders : "WrapperVersion" and "InjectorVersion".
- Copy only "d3d9.dll", "enbhost.exe", and "enblocal.ini" from "WrapperVersion" folder ( POSTING THE ENBSERIES BINARY FILES ON NEXUS SITES IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED ), into your Skyrim root directory ( usually: x:\program files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim ).

STEP 2:
- Download my mod.
- Extract it.
- Select all files from [ Skyrim folder ].
- Copy selected files into your Skyrim root directory.
- Copy files from [ Data folder ] to your "Skyrim\Data" folder.

STEP 3:
- Edit enblocal.ini, or copy ini file from my mod archive (if you have similar hardware: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780 Ti, Intel Core i7 4790K, 32GB ram, Windows 7 x64), into your Skyrim root directory, remember -  everyone should adapt it to own hardware !!! [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:ENBlocal_INI] Enblocal.ini Guide [/url]
- Play the game :)



[center][b][color=#93c47d][size=5]
if you like it, please endorse :)
[/size][/color][/b][/center]

[center][b][size=3][color=#93c47d]
CHECK OUT MY OTHER PRESET:
[/color][/size][/b][/center]
[center][b][size=5][color=#93c47d]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?] ---------------------- Rudy ENB ---------------------- [/url]
[/color][/size][/b][/center]





- Designed for vanilla clouds and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?] Revamped Exterior Fog [/url].
[color=#f6b26b]- Sharpening, Vignette and Letterbox can be adjusted in the GUI - shaders menu - effect.txt.ini.[/color]

[color=#f6b26b][size=3]

Night Vision code by Scegielski - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50731/?] "Enhanced ENB Night Eye" [/url][/size][/color]

!!!! If you want to use NIGHTEYE - you must download eps file from : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50731/?] "Enhanced ENB Night Eye" [/url] and turn it on - settings are available in the shaders menu -
enbeffect.fx.ini. Maybe you will have to recalibrate the effect. All functions are available in the GUI.



[color=#f6b26b]A few remarks:[/color]
 
 - You must change these lines in SkyrimPrefs.ini
                                  
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1

- Turn off antialiasing and anisotropic filtering in game options menu or graphic card drivers. Enb has own antialiasing and anisotropic filter.

- I strongly recommend to install  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?] Revamped Exterior Fog [/url], and  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30050/?] Sub Surface Full Body Map [/url] if you use UNP or Coverwomen bodies.

- For smooth working Skyrim : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48387/?] REAL uGRIDS to load SOLUTION and MORE [/url]

- Ini tweaks : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51300/?] SkyrimPrefs and INIs for Performance and Graphics Boost [/url]




For better visuals :

- I recommend to download [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499] Mindflux Skyrim particle patch for ENB[/url]
